description: Complete system overview documenting the issue tracking workflow, key components, and their interactions in the multi-language service environment
Detailed documentation of the service number to project mapping system, including client categorization, reason codes, and regional naming conventions
Technical specification of the two-stage deletion process, archiving rules, batch processing, and data integrity checks
Documentation of trend analysis algorithms, including client frequency analysis, issue categorization, and performance optimizations
Comprehensive documentation of data flow between IssueForm, archiving logic, and analytics components, including image handling and validation processes
